text: King's Pavillion is an oasis from the frenzy of Kandy. Set above the city it has wonderful views across the valley. It is ideally situated to see the main sights of Kandy. It is a small hotel with wonderful staff. They were attentive without being intrusive. The food was lovely and it is a delight to sit on the terrace each evening and enjoy a meal. The Maître d' was charming and all the restaurant staff could not have been better. My room was large, bright, clean, quiet and very comfortable. I can thoroughly recommend staying at King's Pavillion.
title: Peace and tranquility in Kandy

ownerResponse/text:
We enjoyed your company too...

Thank you - for keeping your promise, making me smile this morning, and for outdoing all others with praise for me personally! I can’t recall anyone being quiet so kind but alas, I must graciously share the limelight with 52 dedicated souls who made your week a happy one, and whose attention to detail invariably surpasses my own. It was a pleasure to be your host however and spend time in your company. Thank you for taking an interest in how I came to be here and the story behind the hotel. 

I’m delighted our modest effort met the moment of your wife's significant celebration (TA forbids use of names in replies). Guest celebrations add smiles to our days too, but whether the same would be said, by your early morning coffee steward is anyone's guess!

Given that so many remarkable things have been written already, I cannot imagine the task of reviewing Buckingham Place – in our 15th year I still pinch myself with every great review. As for less than ecstatic ones? Some remind me that we are only human, while most remind me that others are! 

I hope we have the privilege of welcoming you back to the hotel soon. In the meantime, thank you for your valuable good custom, excellent company and a review that humbles us all. I wish you safe, peaceful and happy travels and a blissfully happy life.

Thank you.

Warmest regards and respect

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
We promised Mr Nick, (Nick Buckingham, owner and operator) that we would write a review following our stay, during which we celebrated Belinda's "significant" birthday. 
I thought it might be helpful to seek inspiration from what other guests are saying. Honestly, it is if they are in a competition to outdo each other in their praises of Mr Nick's hospitality - the rooms, the views, the food, the staff, the beach, the location, the wildlife - all receive rave reviews. And we wholeheartedly agree!
Bizarrely, I did find a couple of reviews which weren't ecstatic and all I can say is, they must have been staying at a different hotel.
Mr Nick, your attention to detail is magnificent, from the "Happy Birthday" message written with flower petals in our room, the Birthday Cake and Happy Birthday banner on our last night, or the fresh coffee delivered to our verandah every morning as we watched the sun come up - awesome, all of it.
Thankyou, Nick, we had a wonderful time at your hotel and enjoyed your company immensely.
title: A trip go Sri Lanka to celebrate Belinda's birthday.

ownerResponse/text:
Always Best Guests...

Many thanks for reposting this fabulous thumbs up on Trip Advisor, and for posting it in the first instance as a Google review. Support on either is appreciated, appearing on both could not be more helpful for us.

To be frank, your remarkably flattering title and last sentence should convince any traveler they need look no further. All the same, I’m equally grateful for everything you write in between – for the avoidance of doubt! On behalf of everyone here, thank you very much for coming back – again. Thanks for your continued loyalty and kind words, and for being such good sports. We enjoyed seeing you again, as much as we did spending time in your company. 

Until next time and always, I wish the both of you safe and happy travels, a blissfully happy life – and more trouble-free miles than can be walked in a lifetime to your good lady wife!! 

Warm regards & respect
Nick, Kalpa & the Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Many places call themselves boutique hotels but Buckingham Place is truely the definition of what that really is. Fabulous suites, delicious meals, knowledgeable and attentive staff in a glorious location with excellent facilities make this place our favourite resort in Sri Lanka. All this is overseen by the hospitable owner, Nick Buckingham, who has lovingly developed the resort over many years, providing valuable employment for the locals and has built up a well trained crew. Nothing was too difficult and any need was happily accommodated. We will be back for our 4th visit either later this year or early next year
title: Always our best stay in Sri Lanka

ownerResponse/text:
More than guests. 

Your surprise stay was an unexpected delight for us too, and also, from the moment you arrived until you left. Without wishing to seem gleeful, your booking mishap was great news for us. Not only for your valuable, unexpected custom, but finding ourselves with four cheerful souls - a magical family to host, just as the hotel was emptying as is traditional for early May. Your stay could not have been more welcome, pleasant or better timed.

Despite my age, my memory for past guests is pretty good. No recall of names naturally, but so far faces, especially those of standout folk. I shall remember you all, for the sunshine you brought us and, your remarkable patience and positivity. I would surely have ranted and been a crushing bore had my own holiday gone so awry! 

I am delighted we were here for you and on point, and, that you have written so eloquently recounting, an experience over a hotel stay. Your support through your good custom and top-notch review is highly prized and second to none. Thank you, thanks to all of you and your travel agents! It was a pleasure, a privilege and another fond memory for us all, plus, more happy travelers we can look forward to welcoming back someday soon, I hope.

Until next time and always, have a happy life all of you, which from my meeting you, surely means simply more of the same!   

Warm regards & respect

Nick Kalpa & The team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Due to a booking issue with our original hotel, we unexpectedly found ourselves at Buckingham Place — and what a stroke of luck it turned out to be! Honestly, we now wish everyone would have a “booking issue” like ours. 😉

From the moment we arrived until the second we left, everything was just right. And if something wasn’t, the team made it right immediately. The attention to detail here is outstanding — we won’t spoil the surprises, but trust us, they’ve thought of everything.

It’s hard to explain exactly what makes this place so special. It’s not just the comfort, design, or food — though all are excellent. It’s the atmosphere, the calm, the care. You’ll see it echoed in every other review.

Above all, it’s the people who make Buckingham Place truly exceptional. The staff are warm, thoughtful, and genuinely committed to making your stay perfect. And Nick, the owner, leads by example — always present, always welcoming.

This wasn’t just a hotel stay; it was an experience. We’ll definitely be back.
title: A surprise stay that turned into something unforgettable

ownerResponse/text:
Angels are smiling! 

Thank you, our busiest season for 6 years could not have drawn to a more beautiful or helpful close. Truly, I struggle to adequately express appreciation for your smashing review. It doesn't miss a beat or leave doubt, those who read it will simply come too; because, if it inspired me to look back at reviews for the season it will inspire them to. You amplify a thousand times, how wonderful our guest lists are and the affection, passion and respect many shares for this place, moreover, the team behind it doing all the hard work. I cannot thank you enough for your many accolades, I can barely count them. And, although humbled, we will bask in your praise at our end of season party when I recite your 'mother of reviews' for the team - before the arrack starts flowing that is!

That you thought to keep Buckingham Place a secret in case everybody comes? All I can say is, without perfect reviews like yours, this being a small, remote access hotel it would be done for in no time and thus, not here to welcome you back - I hear you are already checking dates?! 

Thank you again for coming, and for your good custom, eloquence and for being awesome guests. I'm thrilled you had a magical and memorable stay; it was a pleasure and a privilege to serve you, and I'm still overwhelmed by your kind words!

Until next time and always, safe and happy travels to you both and a blissfully happy life. 

Ayubowan. 

Nick, Kalpa and the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Echoing countless other comments on this site, Buckingham Place is one of the most memorable and probably the best hotel we’ve ever stayed in, and was the highlight of our 16 day trip.
From the moment we drove into the hotel complex to the moment we were waved off by the team saying goodbye, everything was simply perfect….every member of the team was congenial and ‘on it’ …nothing was too much trouble and needs we didn’t know we had were met and exceeded. They have all been trained by Nick Buckingham, the owner and very amenable host, whose pride in what he has built is understandable and just shines through.
The food is excellent…it didn’t occur to us to explore eating anywhere else, the pool area and gardens are Conde Nast cover shoot worthy and we enjoyed a skilful massage at the spa.
We had a secluded superior room and it was huge…a separate dressing area and a bathroom to die for…open air shower anyone?
The attention to detail was inherent throughout, from the flowers that adorned our room to the candle and matches next to the sunken bath tub, to the refillable water bottles that meant we didn’t see a plastic bottle for the entirety of our stay….and the coffee brought to our room every morning to drink on the veranda was especially welcome.
The beach is deserted, which we loved, with miles of clean beautiful sand accompanied by roaring waves, nature at its finest. The only time we ventured out was for a couple of hours one evening…it was a wrench…but we were rewarded by the sight of a turtle laying eggs and baby turtles scrabbling to the sea for the first time…just magical.
I almost didn’t write this review as I’d love to keep Buckingham Place a secret, but as it was recommended to me, I’m doing the right thing and recommending it also. I was unusually emotional when it came to leave and we’re already talking about when we can return. It really is a gem of a place.
title: Turns out heaven IS a place on earth

ownerResponse/text:
Thank you very much for your excellent review.

I am delighted to read and share your kind words with the team this morning. Such an unequivocal recommendation helps sustain c60 livelihoods (including mine) and everything we do here. For a remote access property, perfect reviews are vital to survival.

I am so pleased that you enjoyed yourselves at Buckingham Place and agree wholeheartedly. I wish you had been able to stay longer – maybe there will be a next time?!

Thank you for your valuable good custom, helpful support here on Trip Advisor and, your excellent company. I enjoyed meeting you too and hope I will again.
    
Our warm regards and thanks,

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: The only drawback was that we did not stay longer. The room and service was excellent, and you are made to feel welcome as soon as you step into the grounds. Excellent location for turtle watching, problem was the sea was rough but the pool made up for it. Met Mr Nick Buckingham, the owner and he is a very decent chap, and enjoy our conversation.
title: Excellent hotel. A stay here is well worth it.

ownerResponse/text:
A first!

Just to say thanks again for ticking all the boxes - as guests and with your ‘Just wonderful’ review. Occasionally, a guests’ enthusiasm for getting their review ducks in a row, can result in theirs being published before they’ve checked out, giving me the opportunity to thank them in person. Nattering with you at breakfast, the very moment you were posting Just wonderful is an absolute first - it doesn't get better!

Many thanks to you all, for coming to stay, for your good custom and keen interest in the Buckingham Place story, and, for sharing your enthusiasm for everything we do here.

As I said, I hope you’ll become regular guests who like you, get the message of this place and have figured out, I built it for folk just like them.

Until next time and always, happy and safe travels.

Warm regards and respect,

Nick Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Just superb.  I had high expectations before I came but once here my experience exceeded my expectations.   The staff were outstanding, so friendly and happy.  The food was excellent and the dinner was different every night. Our time here was so relaxing, peaceful and Nick, the owner, was so helpful.  Couldn’t fault our time here and can highly recommend this hotel.
title: Just wonderful

ownerResponse/text:
Bitte verzeihen Sie Übersetzungsfehler.... Vielen Dank, Ihr großartiges Lob, Ihr wertvoller Brauch und Ihre ausgezeichnete Gesellschaft sind wirklich unübertroffen!  

I am happy and proud this morning – truly, I’m bowled over having just read four beautiful reviews. I’m sure the team will be too the moment your praise starts pinging between telephones! One is enough to make us happy, but four??! 

Trip Advisor doesn’t allow using names in replies, so, to you four wonderful human beings (!) who shared such positive experiences of your stay at Buckingham Place by writing: The best hotel service and food I've had anywhere!; Best relaxing hotel; Traumhaft and, The perfect hotel; I send my heartfelt thanks on behalf of the team – you humble us as you put the food on our plates.
 
Thank you for assuring travelers in your footsteps the hotel really does live up to its accolades; that, you liked not feeling obligated to tip staff but if you choose to you prefer to at the end, knowing it goes equally to all; that our ‘awesome’ hotel is located on a beautiful, wild beach where turtles lay their eggs and that Buckingham Place is a place to really chill out and relax. 

All of you must realise, top-notch reviews like yours are key to sustaining a hotel, especially one at a remote access location. You understand too I’m sure, how much they reward and motivate a team, which is of course why you’ve written them! Your unequivocal thumbs up reviews, all four of them, are as perfect as you were as guests. It was a pleasure and privilege to host you and send you home with happy memories.

Thank you for coming to stay and for being awesome guests. Naturally, we’d be thrilled to welcome you all back so please get packing! In the meantime, and always, I wish you happy travels and blissfully happy lives. 

I hope we meet again...

Ayubowan
 
Our Warm Wishes & Respect

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
The perfect hotel.  We felt so looked after.  So much thought had gone into making your stay perfect.  Great food, great location and lovely staff.  
A place to really chill out and relax. 
Opportunities to go out on trips - we did a bird safari.  And spa on site. 
Thank you Nick and all your lovely staff.
title: The perfect hotel

placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Für Rollstühle ist das Hotel nicht geeignet, da es am Hang liegt und Treppen überwunden werden müssen
text:
Dieses Hotel ist einfach genial. Es liegt an einem wunderschönen, wilden Strand. Dort kommen ab der Dämmerung die Schildkröten an den Strand, um ihre Eier abzulegen. Wenn man das beobachten möchte,  kann man sich im Büro nebenan anmelden. 
Das Hotel besteht aus lauter Einzelhäuschen, wunderschön gelegen. Die Zimmer sind riesengroß mit großen Badezimmer, wobei das Dach der Dusche offen ist und über der Badewanne ein Glasdach. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Das Essen außerordentlich gut. Vom Pool aus hat man einen schönen Blick auf das Meer. Sehr angenehm fanden wir, dass nicht für jeden Handschlag ein Trinkgeld erwartet wurde. Im Zimmer lag ein Umschlag, dort konnte man am Ende des Aufenthaltes Trinkgeld hineinlegen, das monatlich an alle Angestellten verteilt wird.
title: Traumhaft

placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Stay longer.
text: Excellent relaxing hotel. Food outstanding, brilliant room with open air shower and huge bath. The staff excelled in everything. Really good idea about no tipping until the end of your stay if you so wish, and then shared equally amongst staff, making it a real team effort. The owner Nick really has made this place a priority stay in Sri Lanka.
title: Best relaxing hotel

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: This hotel is an absolute gem! Before we arrived I'd read the reviews and questioned whether the hotel could live up to all the accolades. But be assured it does - the food is absolutely incredible. The service is literally the best I've seen in any hotel, anywhere. Warm, helpful, without being too intense. When my son was ill they made him food he was happy to eat, and took away any stress from the situation. The pool area is a wow. The beach is beautiful -  as everyone says, you cannot swim in the sea by the hotel, but a walk along to the rock pool for a dip first thing is a memorable activity. This was a perfect ending to a wonderful Sri Lankan stay. Couldn't recommend more! Well done Nick and team!
title: The best hotel service and food I've had anywhere!

ownerResponse/text:
I’m enjoying my morning - thank you! 

As I share recent rave reviews with the team, as I reply to exceptionally kind folk who wrote them – now you, I feel immensely proud and lucky. Proud to have (accidently) created a place that captures the hearts and imaginations of its patrons, and lucky - that I still enjoy my life as a hotelier, 15 years on from reinventing myself as one. Thank you, but the picture you paint of a happy, wonderful hotel, simply reflects how I feel and is the root cause of it, if that makes any sense?

Obviously, your praise humbles me to the point of blushing but, it makes me smile a lot too, thank you. That said, I won’t take all the credit for your memorable stay or the reason you require another. Propping me up is a band of happy, diligent, hardworking men and women, all of whom going to the end of the earth every day for their guests and me. I haven’t a clue why they’d hide the swim up bar from you though, at least you have another reason to come back?!

I’m delighted you enjoyed yourselves, approve the colour scheme and, have written so eloquently in favour of what this place is all about. You were excellent, very welcome company, so thank you again. 

Until we meet again, happy greetings from Rekawa, where the sky is as blue and sunny as it gets, and the music, is barely audible over the sweet sound of the sea…     

Thank you,

Warm regards and respect

Nick Kalpa and The Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: What a wonderful hotel. Where to start? The colours everywhere are just a dopamine hit (think Miami 1990's with a mid-century touch). The staff are incredibly helpful, professional and kind. Nick, the owner and spirit of the hotel is a generous host and charming raconteur who enjoys meeting everyone and creates a feeling of welcome and ease. The food is delicious and the menu outstanding. Everything about the hotel  is of a high standard and really well thought-out (though we didn't discover the swim up bar until the day we were leaving. This will require another visit). Thank you so much for a really memorable stay.
title: A happy, wonderful hotel

ownerResponse/text:
Thank you, 'Team Norway'' and hello, to all our Norwegian friends!

I send thanks for your fabulous reviews with these same words. 

The four of you were so incredibly laid back and a real pleasure to host, with day-long smiles for everyone and abundant empathy for those serving you. I was especially touched by your interest in the history of the hotel and how I came to be here. It’s a long story as you discovered (more next time), but however I came to be here I built Buckingham Place for sensitive, intelligent, good-hearted folk like yourselves, who would appreciate its message and feel better about life for it. 

I am so pleased you got the best from us and that the hotel made you smile! Thanks again to you all for your valuable custom, high recommendation and above all, excellent company. It was a joy and privilege to serve you so quite naturally, we would be thrilled to welcome you back and do so again! 

Until next time (?) and always, on behalf of us all I wish you healthy and blissfully happy lives.

Our gratitude and respect,

Nick, Kalpa and the Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: What an absolutely perfect place! The apartments, the grounds, the colours, the food and above all: The staff. The most friendly and accommodating hotel staff I have ever experienced. If you’re looking for a place that makes you feel welcome, look no further. This is it. Highly recommended.
title: Perfect holiday

ownerResponse/text:
Heartwarming…

To return anywhere after 10 years takes a huge leap of faith – thank you for yours. If it hasn’t closed down, been paved over or ‘modernized’ to suit a younger demographic, it is very rare to find anywhere as good as or better than it was back then. Your stand out review therefore, is incredibley helpful. It reasures all former guests, all first time to Sri Lanka travelers and us too, that we are still on the right track after all these years, and previous reviews remain relevant. Thank you very much for a truly heartwarming confidence boost!

Your valued custom, top recommendation and moreover, your excellent company, are all second to none. And, whilst I might complain your return with grown up kids aged me a tad, I shall do my best to be here when they bring theirs!!

Thank you for coming back - that you did was a highlight of the season for us all. 

Until next time and always, I wish you all a very happy life.

Warm regards and respect,

Nick, Kalpa and The Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
This was our second visit to Buckingham Place. We first stayed 10 years ago and have been dreaming of returning ever since. Now, as a family of four, we returned and the kids loved it as much as we did!
If anything - it was even better than our first stay!
Everything was fantastic - the friendly staff, amazing food, stunning view and beach and huge warm pool.
We were welcomed back like old friends and we left knowing we will return!
Book it, you will not be disappointed!
title: Wonderful!

ownerResponse/text:
Thank you, 'Team Norway'' and hello, to all our Norwegian friends!

I send thanks for your fabulous reviews with these same words. 

The four of you were so incredibly laid back and a real pleasure to host, with day-long smiles for everyone and abundant empathy for those serving you. placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: This is the perfect place in Tangalle. Buckingham Place is magic, wonderful rooms, excellent service and amazing staff. The food was also super- with new menus every day. But I think what I loved the most was the vibrant colors all over the hotel ( yellow, blue and turquoise. It made me in an excellent mood every day.  I can strongly recommend this hotel, you will love it!
title: The perfect place to relax

ownerResponse/text:
Top Guests!

Sometimes, a review says as much or more about its originator, than the hotel itself. Yours is a perfect example - thank you. 

I am touched by the fact that in spite of your brief stay, you have taken time and made the effort to write a stand-out review - for the sake of those in your footsteps and in support of us. I’m delighted we could add to the overall enjoyment of your time in Sri Lanka, and sent you home nurturing an idea perhaps, to return one day? If only we’d had longer to convince you or you had met some of our regular guests who would leave you in no doubt, that Sri Lanka is definitely not a once only destination.  

However briefly guests visit they are no less appreciated for choosing the hotel, or for their valuable custom and good company. Thank you for yours and this over and above review. Simply, you are 'top' guests, and we would be privileged to serve you again. In the meantime, and always, I wish you happy travels and blissfully happy lives.

Thanks for making us smile this morning!

Warm regards & respect,

Nick, Kalpa & the Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Just enjoy the tranquil setting
text:
Arrived late in the dark just for one night. WhatsApp messages before our arrival really helped with restaurant choices. 
Room very clean and huge. 
Staff extremely welcoming and friendly. 
Best meal we had in Sri Lanka and very reasonable and relaxed. 
The hotel is right on the beach and well worth a walk.
Just wished we had longer there. 
Met Nick the owner during dinner and the next morning. Top bloke really enjoyed talking to him. 
Nice touch from the bar staff with an iced water after our beach walk.
Every single member of staff is an asset to the hotel. 
Sadly flying visit but if we ever come back to Sri Lanka this hotel will be on our list ( but for a longer stay) 
Thanks again for a great trip
title: Stunning location

ownerResponse/text:
Delightful.

Thank you for a helpful, truly delightful review and these super new photos. 

That your stay was a happy and relaxing one is rewarding to read - just about everything we do is aimed at enabling everyone to simply kick off their shoes, feel at home and be as unashamedly lazy as they like!
  
Reviews this good are our lifeblood but never taken for granted. Your kind generous praise plus that of others, in addition to your valuable good custom of course, sustains c60 families directly, local suppliers, service providers and sub-contractors, and the various community initiatives the hotel itself supports. I highlight this and add wider thanks from a proud if slightly less than privileged community. 

Thank you for choosing Rekawa and Buckingham Place and for being fabulous guests. It was a pleasure to host and serve you, we naturally hope we have the opportunity to do so again. In the meantime, I wish you both exciting but safe travels, and happy and healthy life!

Warm regards & sincere thanks

Nick, Kalpa & the Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: We had a lovely stay at Buckingham Place, Nick and his team do a great job of making everyone feel at home and create a super relaxed atmosphere. The view over the ocean from the pool is so pretty and you can easily access the beach for a walk. The food is very good quality and the restaurant is a delight to eat and relax in. Rooms are very big and the outdoor bathroom was a nice addition, we didn't have anything other than the odd gheko joining us there.  Lots of wildlife to watch  outside the rooms with a nice secluded veranda in the lovely gardens. The hotel is located very close to the turtle sanctuary, we enjoyed a couple of hrs watching a turtle lay eggs and covering them up. We would recommend for a relaxing beach trip.
title: Lovely relaxing stay by the beach

ownerResponse/text:
Please excuse errors of translation.

Fabuleux indeed.

Thank you very much for coming to stay, and for following up with this fabulous review!
 
You generously compliment all aspects of the hotel so I have circulated a translated copy of your review amongst the team this morning, who will be as proud as I am to read your kind praise. I am only sorry that I wasn't aware of your initial disappointment over being unable to swim in the sea. I can only say how relieved I am that our team, cuisine, cocktails and the beach itself, nonetheless measured up to mitigate this, and that it didn’t detract unduly from your stay overall.
 
Thank you for bringing your valuable good custom and fine company to Buckingham Place, and for supporting us all so magnificently on this forum. If you ever return to Sri Lanka, like so many do please be sure to stay with us again - it would be a pleasure and privilege to welcome you both back.

In the meantime, I wish you happy travels and blissfully happy life.

Thank you.

Warm regards and respect

Nick, Kalpa and the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text:
Malgré une petite déception à l’arrivée due au fait qu’il est déconseillé de nager dans la mer devant l’hôtel en raison de courants trop fort, la plage a néanmoins l’avantage d’être sauvage et propre.
Personnel super à l’écoute des clients, tous tellement gentils !
Chambre et salle de bain gigantesques et magnifiques, vue sur lagune.
Restauration et cocktails exceptionnels ! La meilleure cuisine de tout notre séjour.
Piscine principale très grande, à débordement et vue sur la mer. Piscine secondaire très au calme.
Prix des prestations plus que raisonnables.
Taxes et service compris. Aucun pourboire pendant le séjour mais à laisser dans une enveloppe au départ si désiré.
Comme l’hôtel n’a que 16 chambres, tranquillité assurée partout sur le site.
title: Fabuleux !

ownerResponse/text:
Glorious.

Yes, your first sentence should be enough for any traveler but if not, everything that follows it will melt the most diehard skeptic and have them beat a path to our gates immediately.

Your glorious review brought a big grin to my face and, a lump to my throat this morning – thank you, I will of course share it with the Team. You say you struggled to better your previous words? You only prove what a spectacular wordsmith you are with both reviews – they are as good as they get quite frankly, thank you for taking the time to support is so magnificently. Your praise for everyone overwhelms and humbles us all.
 
That you feel a sense of belonging at Buckingham Place is because you do, you belong here by becoming a part it. You’re in its DNA, whether by socialising with other guests or me, embarking on a project with the Team or springing to my mind when I boast how good our guest lists are. You may not realise or believe this, we look forward to your holiday, enjoy it too, and are sad to wave goodbye as you leave. This time you were a big part of two especially joyous weeks, with nearly half the house occupied with lovely folk we’ve seen before.

I feel confident to send this from the bottom of every heart here. You two are up there with the best. I cannot think of another couple I would rather share this oasis of timeless tranquility with, or two more engaging, interesting, elegant old-school travelers who come to stay.

Thank you for bringing your valuable good custom to us again and for your empathy towards us all. Thank you for writing so eloquently about your stay once again but above all - thank you for being such great company. I shall look forward to welcoming you back for stay No4. In the meantime, and always, please take care of yourselves and each other, and have a blissfully happy and healthy life.

Warmest regards and respect - and the biggest of hugs!

Nick, Kalpa and the Team.
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
roomTip:
Great spa
Don’t expect to swim in the sea
Explore the village
Just enjoy!
text:
This was our 3rd visit to Buckingham Place .. that in itself says it all!!! and I’m struggling to better the words I wrote last time.
Here goes….
Stop all the clocks…. As the entrance gate glides effortlessly open and beckons you in you are embraced  into an oasis of timeless tranquility.
There is an air of unspoken understated elegance and perfection.
Nick you welcomed us again into the gem you have created and continue to nurture, along with your team. Every single member of the team, lead impeccably by Kalpa are the best….discreet, genuine, respectful, knowledgeable, humble,kind, willing, 
professional, happy and an absolute joy.
In business I always advocated of its success was all in the planning and detail resulting in delivering a seamless stress free experience…. That is exactly what happens at Buckingham Place.
I don’t feel I ‘stay’ at Buckingham Place’, I feel I belong.
Thank you from the bottom of my heart.. until next time.
title: The Best

ownerResponse/text:
Wow!!

I don’t know how many hotels you visited but that ours was your favourite is a wonderful complement - thank you, I’m thrilled that it was. 

I’m delighted the hotel stood out for all the right reasons, and grateful for the timely swimming reminder – it can never be said too many times! For others reading my reply, the nearby rock pool is great for splashing around in, swimmable beaches are within easy reach - we recommend according to time of year. Rekewa’s Beach is also clean, unspoiled and thus a prime nesting ground at night for Sea Turtles.

Thank you for staying with us - do please come back; and join the many lovely folk for whom Buckingham Place has become a favourite old club! Thanks again for your valuable custom and this fabulous review, but moreover, thank you for your excellent company, 

Until next time (?) and always, thank you, have a blissfully happy and healthy life!    

Wam regards & respect,

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: This was my favorite hotel in Sri lanka. The rooms are enormous as is the breakfast. Food is great. However, what makes Nicks place is the fact that it is more like a refined beach club than a hotel. There were many returning guests and even a couple who had specifically travelled to Sri lanka to stay here. The beach is lovely and empty - the only downside is that you cannot swim due to the currents, although there is a rock pool swimming areaa.
title: Great stay

ownerResponse/text:
Please be sure to come back...

Thank you very much for coming to stay, and for following up with this top-notch review. I’m delighted you enjoyed yourselves, especially your kids, and flattered by your ‘Beautiful hotel’ compliment. It could go without saying that we would be thrilled to welcome you back one day, but for now I’ll simply thank you again for choosing Buckingham Place, and for your valuable good custom and fine company.
 
On behalf of us all I wish all of you, happy travels and a blissfully happy life!

Warm regards & respect,

Nick, Kalpa & the Team
placeInfo/address: Rekawa Beach Road Rekawa Village, Rekawa, Tangalle 82200 Sri Lanka
text: Beautiful hotel with direct Beach access. The staff is very kind and attending! Our kids loved the infinity pool with ocean view and pool bar. Try the Egg Hoppers on the lunch menu, they are excellent!! And be sure to walk to the rock pool on the beach, really amazing
title: Great time

placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Great place to stay close to Columbo airport after arriving from a long flight
text:
Wonderful place, staff were so lovely and accommodating - food was tasty and plentiful, 80% sources from the estate, the rest from local
Villages.  Accommodation was very comfortable and the pool was the icing on the cake.  Make sure you take the ox cart ride through the grounds.
title: Wonderful start to our Sri Lankan adventure

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,

We're delighted your first night with us left such a strong impression. Isuru will be thrilled to hear your kind words he takes great pride in sharing the heart of our estate and its flavours.

From the farm-to-table meals to the gentle rhythm of a bullock cart ride, we’re glad you embraced it all. We hope the rest of your journey carried the same energy forward.

With gratitude,
The Horathapola Team
placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
text: First night stay in Sri Lanka and I’m not sure if this can be surpassed. The service, food and surriundings are amazing. Izuru looked after us so well and the bullock cart trip is a must. All fruit and veg are home grown and finding out all about the local cuisine sustainably is a must. Just fabulous
title: Not to be missed!!

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Geoff,

Thank you for your lovely review. We’re thrilled Horathapola’s mix of heritage charm and working estate life resonated with you. We’re especially glad you chose to take the bullock cart ride, it often surprises guests by how quietly revealing it is.

Thamara will be deeply touched by your words, and the frangipani tree continues to bloom by the pool, just as stunning as you left it.

Looking forward to seeing you again someday.

Kind regards,
The Horathapola Team
placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Visit the quirky wine cellar and definitely experience the chef at work in his spotless kitchen
text: Such a lovely surprise to turn up at this beautiful period property set within its own 50acre estate thats dedicated to growing all of the fresh produce we enjoyed whilst staying there. Horathapola harks back to an age of elegance with beautifully maintained period furniture and decor. We hesitated at the offer of a bullock cart ride, tending to avoid overtly 'touristy' things but a gentle amble around the estate in the back of this lovely cart brings home just how much is grown here. Thamara, the manager couldn't do enough for us and is a credit to the hotel. The massive frangipani tree just next to the pool is a real landmark and sets off the property beautifully. Definitely recommend a stay here.
title: Heritage and natural living

placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
text:
Set in the heart of the countryside this beautiful, boutique hotel is a gem. On arriving at the hotel we were greeted by friendly staff offering refreshing drinks. The building itself is an old house brimming with antiques and interesting works of art. It is surrounded by a lush garden, and beyond this coconut palms stretch as far as the eye can see. A myriad of exotic, brightly coloured birds and butterflies have made the estate their home.
Our room was located on the ground floor, beautifully furnished and with a lovely spacious veranda to relax on and enjoy our surroundings. Each night we ate on our veranda sumptious Sri Lankan dishes freshly prepared to our tastes and using ingredients grown on the estate. One evening we joined the chef to watch him prepare our meal.
There was a lovely pool in the garden to swim in. In the morning we were taken on a walk around the estate's gardens and into the local village. We visited the coconut processing plant which was very interesting. Our guide showed us the different fruits, vegetables and flowers that are grown locally. It was the first time that I had seen coffee grown! We also went on a bullock ride around the estate where we were able to sample a wide range of tropical fruits that were growing.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Horathapola Estate and would recommend it as a wonderful and interesting place to stay.
title: Paradise in the Heart of the Countryside

ownerResponse/text:

placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
text:
This wonderful place gave us such a good start for our holiday, we loved it!
Beautiful colonial style house in beautiful gardens with a lovely swimming pool. All set within a coconut estate about an hour north of the airport.
We were looked after extremely well - had excellent food and even watched it being cooked on a traditional range one evening. We were taken on a guided walk in the local area and had the crops, the birdlife, the culture and the local employment all explained to us and met some local villagers husking cashews. We had a bullock cart ride through the coconut grove and were introduced to the estate crops and livestock.
It was a real joy, enhanced by very kind and thoughtful staff who were lovely as well as quietly efficient.
title: Fabulous!

placeInfo/address: No. 6 Wadumunnegedara, Marawila 60200 Sri Lanka
text:
If it were possible to give a 6 star rating this place would earn it. On an organic coconut estate founded in 1922 they were exceptional in every way. Service and welcome brilliant. Food cooked in a traditional way using mostly locally grown ingredients  really special. Take advantage of their visit to the kitchen to see how food is cooked in clay pots on an open coconut shell fire and be amazed. Loved the village and estate walk to see the coconut factory where nothing is wasted and then see cashew nuts being extracted.
If that's not enough a gin and tonic by the pool. Lovely place lovely people
title: Tranquil and amazing

What a wonderful experience!  
A traditional planter's "cottage" which has been sympathetically-converted into a boutique hotel in the middle of a coconut estate.

text: What an amazing start to our SL holiday. Having read all the reviews below, they're absolutely spot on and I can't really add much else. roomTip: The ox cart ride and tour of the gardens are a must.
text: An absolutely beautiful and quiet oasis to start our Sri Lanka tour.  It's a 50 acre organic farm with water Buffalo, donkeys, cows, oxen, Peacocks, squirrels that look like chipmunks, exotic birds, and more.  The ox cart ride around the farm was amazing - munched on fresh cinnamon, coconuts, along the way.  There are spices, teak and ebony woods, coconut trees, pepper vines, fruit trees, and more.   Our room was a beautiful small cottage with a veranda overlooking a salt water pool.  The staff was outstanding - especially Isuru.  Be sure to see the 300 year old Pajapani tree.  Food excellent.  Can't say enough good things about this very tranquil setting.
title: A perfect place

text:
- The hotel is modern, with many restaurants and bars offering an excellent view of the city and the seaside! The rooms are clean, luxurious, and very quiet, making you feel great.
- The location of the hotel is ideal. Almost all attractions of the city are within walking distance, or 5-10 min. by taxi/tuk tuk.  The Seaside, Buddhist & Hindu temples, the Pettah market, the national museum, the Gale Face shopping mall.
- We had full-board. The variety of food was plentiful and very tasty. We had the chance to taste local dishes, which we cannot find in Europe.  
- The common areas of the hotel are very beautifully decorated, making you feel you are in a museum. 
- The staff is plentiful and very friendly, offering assistance whenever needed. 
- Special thanks to Rabina and Prabudhya. They were very friendly and welcoming, helping us with some small issues.

Thank you for the great hospitality. We wish to come back soon :D
title: Outstanding hotel and hospitality
